author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Yoshinobu Yamamoto Shares Cool Quote To Pump Up Dodgers Fans
text:
Summary by Ground News Yoshinobu Yamamoto has been introduced to the world as a new Los Angeles Dodgers player. He agreed to sign a 12-year, $325 million contract that will keep him in LA, at least theoretically, until he is 37. He will be joining his countryman Shohei Ohtani in the Dodgers exciting project. Share menu More

The Cold Wire Yoshinobu Yamamoto Shares Cool Quote To Pump Up Dodgers Fans (Photo by Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images) Yoshinobu Yamamoto has been introduced to the world as a new Los Angeles Dodgers player. He agreed to sign a 12-year, $325 million contract that will keep him in LA, at least theoretically, until he is 37. He will be joining his countryman Shohei Ohtani in the Dodgers’ exciting project, as well as other established stars like Mookie Betts, Freddie Freeman, Walker Buehler, and more. Yamamoto has offered…
